thread.title: jessica oates

author: jessica oates
title: jessica oates
text: I was very skeptical about joining a site like this, but after seeing the potential to earn cash back on most of my online shopping plus the bonus pay out made the decision easy. I cashed out nearly $40 just for shopping through the site. I've also found so online stores I would not have known about if I had not joined TopCash Back. I did most of my Christmas shopping and after a the wait time for my payments to clear and after return periods were over I cashed out almost $500. You can't tell me its not worth it to be rewarded for being a thrifty shopper.
